メソッドの詳細

factInRange

public static java.math.BigInteger factInRange(int n,
                                               int m)
calcuration n! / m! = n * (n - 1) * ... / m * (m - 1) * ... = n * (n - 1) * .. * (n - m + 1)

パラメータ:
n -
m -
戻り値:
n! / m!

factorial

public static long factorial(int n)
long integer value factorial(n) == n! = 1 * 2 * 3 * ... * (n-1) * n

パラメータ:
n - natural number
戻り値:
n! (0! = 1, 1! = 1)
例外:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If n < 0, throw it.

fact

public static java.math.BigInteger fact(int n)
BigInteger Object factorial(n) == n! = 1 * 2 * 3 * ... * (n-1) * n

パラメータ:
n - natural number
戻り値:
n! (0! = 1, 1! = 1)
例外:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If n < 0, throw it.
